*** Settings ***
Library           OperatingSystem
Library           Collections

*** Test Cases ***
Keyword_Run
    comment    Start calc.exe
    Run    calc.exe

GetEnvironmentVariable
    ${ComputerName}=    Get Environment Variable    COMPUTERNAME
    Log    ${ComputerName}

FileAndDirectory
    @{FileItems}    List Directory    D:\\TempCode    *.rar    True
    ${list}    Create List    @{FileItems}
    Log     ==============
    Log List    ${list}
    log    ${list[0]}
